# Other Matters & Voice Recording Bug Fixes Plan

## Executive Summary

**Previous Session:** Fixed production 500 errors, migration scripts, USER role UI permissions (commit 594c07e)

**Current Issues:**  
1. Other Matters don''t appear - incorrect Android filtering (Line 132, OtherMattersFragment.kt)
2. Voice Recording HTTP 429 - observer leak (Lines 94-98, VoiceRecordingFragment.kt)
3. Agenda tab should show approved Other Matters section

**Finding:** All bugs are Android-side. Backend is correct.

## Issue 1 & 2: Other Matters Not Appearing

**Root Cause:** OtherMattersFragment.kt Line 132 filters out user PROPOSED items

The backend correctly returns: APPROVED items + user''s own PROPOSED items
But Android filters to ONLY APPROVED, throwing away user''s items!

**Fix:** Remove line 132 filter - trust backend filtering

## Issue 3: Voice Recording HTTP 429

**Root Cause:** Observer leak in VoiceRecordingFragment.kt

- onResume() calls loadVoiceRecordings() every time
- Observers accumulate on each tab switch
- Multiple observers trigger simultaneous API calls
- Hits rate limiter (100 req/15min)

**Fix:** Remove onResume() reload (lines 94-98)
